Dao<T>
Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface that defines standard CRUD operations for entities persisted in a relational database.
DaoFactory
Factory class for creating DAO instances with a shared database connection.
DaoImp<T>
Abstract base implementation of the Dao interface, providing common logic for CRUD operations using JDBC.
